message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $20,000. I believe it's a fair offer considering its value.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer but that's a bit too high for my budget. I'm interested in the product, but I could only go as high as $10,000.
I appreciate your interest, Bob. However, $10,000 is significantly below its true value.  I could come down to $17,000. This is my final offer.

Alice, I understand the product's value, but $17,000 is just not feasible for me right now.  I can do $11,000 as my final offer.  If that doesn't work, I'll unfortunately have to consider other options.
